remarks: Derive axiom ~ ax-his2 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axhil.1 $e |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. $.
axhil.2 $e |- U e. CHilOLD $.
axhfi.1 $e |- .ih = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
axhis2-zf $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( A +h B ) .ih C ) = ( ( A .ih C ) + ( B .ih C ) ) ) $.
